item.title: Brighton JUG & Kotlin Summer Social üç∫
item.description: Summer Social We will be taking a break from our usual schedule of talks to get both our meetups together with an IRL social and kick off the summer with a few drinks at the Foundary pub in Brighton. Come and join us by signing up on either the Brighton Kotlin or Brighton JUG meetup pages.
